00041 extern void desalloue_pwd();
00042 void usage()
00043 {
00044   Cerr << "usage:\n";
00045   Cerr << "TRUST_EXECUTABLE [CASE[.data]] [options]\n";
00046   Cerr << " CASE is the basename of the trust data file (must have .data extension)\n";
00047   Cerr << "   If no CASE given, the current directory name is used\n";
00048   Cerr << " -help_trust => print options\n";
00049   Cerr << " -mpi => run in parallel with MPI (must run with mpirun)\n";
00050   Cerr << " -check_enabled=0|1  => enables or disables runtime checking of parallel messages\n";
00051   Cerr << " -debugscript=SCRIPT => execute \"SCRIPT n\" after parallel initialisation, n=processor rank\n";
00052   Cerr << " -petsc=0            => disable call to PetscInitialize\n";
00053   Cerr << " -journal=0..9       => select journal level (0=disable, 9=maximum verbosity)\n";
00054   Cerr << " -journal_master     => only master processor writes a journal (not compatible with journal_shared)\n";
00055   Cerr << " -journal_shared     => each processor writes in a single log file (not compatible with journal_master)\n";
00056   Cerr << " -disable_ieee       => Disable the detection of NaNs. The detection can also be de-activated with env variable TRUST_DISABLE_FP_EXCEPT set to non zero.\n";
00057   Cerr << " -no_verify          => Disable the call to verifie function (from Type_Verifie) to catch outdated keywords while reading data file.\n";
00058   Cerr << " -disable_stop       => Disable the writing of the .stop file.\n";
00059   Cerr << finl;
00060   Process::exit();
00061 }
00062 
00063 #ifdef NDEBUG
00064 #define DEFAULT_CHECK_ENABLED 0
00065 #else
00066 #define DEFAULT_CHECK_ENABLED 1
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 int main_TRUST(int argc, char** argv,mon_main*& main_process,int force_mpi)
00070 {
00071 #ifdef VTRACE
00072 // VT_USER_END("Initialization");
00073 #endif
00074 // Attention: on n'a pas le droit d'utiliser les communications paralleles au debut.
00075 // Cerr et Cout sont OK (variables statiques dans Journal_log_files.cpp)
00076 // Le journal peut etre utilise mais ecrit dans Sortie_Nulle jusqu'a ce qu'on ouvre
00077 // les fichiers (voir Journal_log_files.cpp)
00078 // 
00079 // Voir <PARALLEL_OK>
00080 
00081 // *************** Process command-line arguments ********************
00082   int with_mpi = force_mpi;
00083   int check_enabled = DEFAULT_CHECK_ENABLED;
00084   int with_petsc = -1;       //!< -1 => use petsc if compiled
00085   int nproc = -1;
00086   int verbose_level = 1;
00087   int journal_master = 0;
00088   int journal_shared = 0;
00089   int helptrust = 0;
00090   int ieee = 1;              //!< 1 => use of feenableexcept(FE_DIVBYZERO | FE_INVALID | FE_OVERFLOW); int ieee = 0;              // PolyMAC ?
00091 //
00092   bool apply_verification = true;
00093   int disable_stop = 0;
00094   Nom data_file;
00095   data_file = "";
00096   Nom exec_script;
00097   exec_script = "";
00098   Nom arguments_info;
00099   arguments_info = "Executable: ";
00100   arguments_info += argv[0];
00101   arguments_info += "\n";
00102   for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++)
00103     {
00104 // int error = 0;
00105 // Le -help est reserve par Petsc
00106       if (strcmp(argv[i], "-help_trust") == 0)
00107         {
00108           helptrust = 1;
00109         }
00110       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-disable_ieee") == 0)
00111         {
00112           ieee = 0;
00113           arguments_info += "-disable_ieee => disable of feenableexcept\n";
00114         }
00115       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-mpi") == 0)
00116         {
00117           with_mpi = 1;
00118           arguments_info += "-mpi => parallel computation with mpi\n";
00119         }
00120       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-no_verify") == 0)
00121         {
00122           apply_verification = false;
00123           arguments_info += "-no_verify => Disable the call to verifie function (from Type_Verifie) to catch outdated keywords while reading data file.\n";
00124         }
00125       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-check_enabled=1") == 0)
00126         {
00127           check_enabled = 1;
00128           arguments_info += "-check_enabled=1 => force enable parallel message checking\n";
00129         }
00130       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-check_enabled=0") == 0)
00131         {
00132           check_enabled = 0;
00133           arguments_info += "-check_enabled=0 => force disable parallel message checking\n";
00134         }
00135       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-debugscript=", 13) == 0)
00136         {
00137           exec_script = argv[i]+13;
00138           arguments_info += "-debugscript => execute script ";
00139           arguments_info += exec_script;
00140           arguments_info += "\n";
00141         }
00142       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-petsc=0") == 0)
00143         {
00144           with_petsc = 0;
00145           arguments_info += "-petsc=0 => disable call to PetscInitialize\n";
00146         }
00147       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-journal=", 9) == 0)
00148         {
00149           int level = atoi(argv[i]+9);
00150           if (level < 0 || level > 9)
00151             {
00152               Cerr << "Bad journal level : " << argv[i] << finl;
00153 // error = 1;
00154             }
00155           else
00156             {
00157               verbose_level = level;
00158               arguments_info += "-journal=";
00159               arguments_info += Nom(level);
00160               arguments_info += "\n";
00161             }
00162         }
00163       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-journal_master") == 0)
00164         {
00165           journal_master = 1;
00166           arguments_info += "-journal_master => Only the master processor will write a journal";
00167           if(journal_shared)
00168             {
00169               journal_shared = 0;
00170               arguments_info += " (journal_shared is thus ignored)";
00171             }
00172           arguments_info += "\n";
00173         }
00174       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-journal_shared") == 0)
00175         {
00176           journal_shared = 1;
00177           arguments_info += "-journal_shared => all the processors are going to write in a unique journal file";
00178           if(journal_master)
00179             {
00180               journal_master = 0;
00181               arguments_info += " (journal_master is thus ignored)";
00182             }
00183           arguments_info += "\n";
00184         }
00185       else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-disable_stop") == 0)
00186         {
00187           disable_stop = 1;
00188           arguments_info += "-disable_stop => Disable the writing of the .stop file.\n";
00189         }
00190       else if (i == 1)
00191         {
00192 // Les deux derniers tests doivent rester a la fin, inserer les arguments supplementaires avant.
00193           data_file = argv[1];
00194           arguments_info += "Data file name = ";
00195           arguments_info += data_file;
00196           arguments_info += "\n";
00197         }
00198       else if (i == 2)
00199         {
00200           errno = 0;
00201           int nprocs = strtol(argv[2], (char **)NULL, 10);
00202           if (!errno && nprocs)
00203             {
00204               nproc = nprocs;
00205               if (nproc > 1)
00206                 {
00207                   with_mpi = 1;
00208                   arguments_info += "Running in parallel with ";
00209                   arguments_info += Nom(nproc);
00210                   arguments_info += " processors\n";
00211                 }
00212               else if (nproc == 1)
00213                 {
00214                   arguments_info += "Sequential calculation\n";
00215                 }
00216               else
00217                 {
00218                   Cerr << "Bad number of processors in old syntax TRUST case N" << finl;
00219 // error = 1;
00220                 }
00221             }
00222           else
00223             {
00224               /*
00225                       Nom fichier=argv[i];
00226                       fichier.prefix(".data");
00227                       fichier+=".data";
00228                       EFichier fic(fichier);
00229                       if(fic.fail())
00230                         {
00231                           Cerr << "Trying to open file " << fichier << finl;
00232                           Cerr << "File " << fichier << " doesnt exist !" << finl;
00233                           Process::exit();
00234                         }
00235                       else
00236                         {
00237                           data_file = fichier.prefix(".data");
00238                         }
00239 // Mise en commentaire car dans certains scripts verifie on teste: trust $jdd -ksp_view
00240               */
00241 // error = 1;
00242             }
00243         }
00244       else
00245         {
00246 // error = 1;
00247         }
00248       /* PL: Je desactive car MPICH rajoute des arguments derriere le nombre de processeurs:
00249          ... TRUST_mpich_opt jdd 2 -p4pg .../PINNNN -p4wd pathname
00250          if (error) {
00251          Cerr << "TRUST error processing command line, argument " << i << " : \n "
00252          << argv[i] << finl;
00253          usage();
00254 // if (i==1) Cerr << "Arguments lus: " << argv[0];
00255 // Cerr << " " << argv[i];
00256          } */
00257     }
00258 
00259   {
00260 
00261     if ( ieee == 1 )
00262       {
00263         char* theValue = getenv("TRUST_DISABLE_FP_EXCEPT");
00264         if (theValue == NULL || atoi(theValue) == 0)
00265           {
00266             arguments_info += "feenableexcept enabled.\n";
00267 #ifdef linux
00268 // Detect all NaNs (don't add FE_UNDERFLOW cause exp(-x) with x big throws an exception)
00269 // Test pre 1.7.0, on active en optimise:
00270 #ifndef _COMPILE_AVEC_CLANG
00271 #ifndef _COMPILE_AVEC_FCC //!< Crashes bizarres 
00272             feenableexcept(FE_DIVBYZERO | FE_INVALID | FE_OVERFLOW);
00273 #endif
00274 #endif
00275 #endif
00276           }
00277       }
00278 
00279 // ************** Initialisation de Petsc, du parallele (si Petsc) **********
00280 // .. et demarrage du journal
00281 // (tout ce qu'on veut faire en commun avec l'interface python doit etre
00282 // mis dans mon_main)
00283     main_process=new  mon_main(verbose_level, journal_master, journal_shared, apply_verification, disable_stop);
00284 
00285     main_process->init_parallel(argc, argv, with_mpi, check_enabled, with_petsc);
00286 
00287 // *************************  <PARALLEL_OK> *****************************
00288 // A partir d'ici on a le droit d'utiliser les communications entre processeurs,
00289 // me() etc...
00290     const int master = Process::je_suis_maitre();
00291 
00292 // Modif B.Mathieu 28/09/2004 :
00293 // Pour debugger trust, on donne parametre le nom
00294 // d'une commande systeme a executer lorsqu'on arrive a cet endroit.
00295 // Le plus pratique, c'est d'utiliser un shell script qui ouvre
00296 // un xterm et lance gdb. On peut aussi faire un tail -f du fichier log,
00297 // etc...
00298 // La commande est executee avec comme parametre le numero du PE.
00299     if(exec_script != "")
00300       {
00301         exec_script += " ";
00302         exec_script += Nom(Process::me());
00303         Cerr << "[" << Process::me() << "] Debug mode => execute command : " << exec_script << finl;
00304         std::cerr << system(exec_script) << std::endl;
00305       }
00306 
00307     if (master)
00308       {
00309         if ( helptrust == 1 ) usage();
00310 
00311 // On affiche le resultat de la ligne de commande ici pour ne pas remplir stderr
00312 // avec tous les processeurs...
00313         Cerr << arguments_info;
00314 
00315         if (nproc != -1 && Process::nproc() != nproc)
00316           {
00317             Cerr << "Error: nproc on command line does not match mpirun parameter.\n"
00318                  << " Use same number or -mpi parameter instead." << finl;
00319             usage();
00320           }
00321       }
00322 
00323     cerr.setf(ios::scientific);
00324     cerr.precision(12);
00325     cout.setf(ios::scientific);
00326     cout.precision(12);
00327 
00328 // ****************** Nom du cas ***********************
00329     if (data_file == "")
00330       {
00331 // TRUST sans argument => nom du cas = nom du repertoire courant
00332         Nom pwd(::pwd());
00333         if (master)
00334           Cerr << "No command line argument. Data file name from directory name:\n "
00335                << pwd << finl;
00336         const int l = pwd.longueur() - 1; //!< Attention, longueur()=strlen+1
00337         int i = l - 1;
00338         while(i > 0 && pwd[i] != directory_separator)
00339           {
00340             i--;
00341           }
00342         if (i == l - 1)
00343           {
00344             if (master)
00345               {
00346                 Cerr << "Error : pwd() ends with directory separator " << (int)directory_separator << finl;
00347                 Process::exit();
00348               }
00349           }
00350         data_file = pwd.substr_old(i + 2, l - i - 1); //!< Attention, voir Nom::substr()
00351       }
00352     if (master)
00353       {
00354         Cerr << "Data file : " << data_file << finl;
00355       }
00356 // Si le nom du cas finit par .data, on l'enleve.
00357     if (data_file.finit_par(".data"))
00358       {
00359         if (master)
00360           {
00361             Cerr << " (removing .data extension)" << finl;
00362           }
00363         data_file.prefix(".data");
00364       }
00365 
00366 
00367 
00368     if (master)
00369       {
00370         Cerr<<"Localisation etude: " << ::pwd() << finl;
00371         Cerr<<"Nom du cas " << data_file << finl;
00372         Cerr<<" code : "<< argv[0] << finl;
00373         Cerr<<" version : 1.8.4 " << finl;
00374       }
00375 
00376     main_process->dowork(data_file);
00377 
00378     if (master)
00379       {
00380         Cerr << "Arret des processes." << finl;
00381       }
00382   }
00383 
00384 // pour detruire les derniers octets
00385   desalloue_pwd();
00386   return (0);
00387 }
